trans-unit.source: Supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati di percorso che si basa su latitudine e longitudine coordinate.

trans-unit.source: The GeoCoordinateWatcher class supplies coordinate-based location data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: La classe GeoCoordinateWatcher fornisce i dati basati su coordinate percorso dal provider di posizione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider is prioritized as the highest on the computer, based on a number of factors, such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by location applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider.
trans-unit.target: Il provider del percorso corrente è in ordine di priorità più elevata nel computer, in base a diversi fattori, ad esempio l'età e l'accuratezza dei dati da tutti i provider, l'accuratezza richiesta dalle applicazioni di percorso e l'impatto di utilizzo e prestazioni power associata al provider di percorso.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Il provider del percorso corrente potrebbe cambiare nel tempo, ad esempio, quando un dispositivo GPS perde il segnale satellite interni e un provider di eseguire la triangolazione Wi-Fi diventa il provider più preciso del computer.

trans-unit.source: To begin accessing location data, create a GeoCoordinateWatcher and call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> or <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> to initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Per iniziare l'accesso ai dati di posizione, creare una classe GeoCoordinateWatcher e chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A>per avviare l'acquisizione dei dati dal provider di posizione corrente.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.TryStart%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property can be checked to determine if data is available.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>proprietà può essere controllata per determinare se sono disponibili dati.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: If data is available, you can get the location one time from the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property, or receive continuous location updates by handling the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Se sono disponibili dati, è possibile ottenere il percorso di una sola volta dal <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>, proprietà o ricevono gli aggiornamenti di posizione continui gestendo il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>evento.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> properties support <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, so that an application can data-bind to these properties.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>il supporto delle proprietà <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, in modo che un'applicazione può associare dati a queste proprietà.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>

trans-unit.source: In Windows 7, all the <xref:System.Device.Location> classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and able to resolve the computer's location.
trans-unit.target: In Windows 7, tutte le <xref:System.Device.Location>classi sono completamente funzionali se è installato un provider di posizione e in grado di risolvere la posizione del computer.</xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the only supported location provider is the Default Location Provider in Control Panel, and an add-in must be installed to specify latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > In Windows 7 Starter Edition, il provider solo percorso supportato è il provider del percorso predefinito nel Pannello di controllo e un componente aggiuntivo deve essere installato per specificare la latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Nota** nelle versioni di Windows precedente a Windows 7, vengono applicate le seguenti condizioni:-tutti <xref:System.Device.Location>gli oggetti che dispongono di costruttori possono essere creati, ma <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>avrà sempre il valore <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> delle proprietà</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Il percorso indicato dalla <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>sarà sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Non vengono generati eventi nessuna posizione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> with default accuracy settings.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> con impostazioni predefinite di accuratezza.

trans-unit.source: The default accuracy setting is <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione di precisione predefinita è <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Nota** nelle versioni di Windows precedente a Windows 7, vengono applicate le seguenti condizioni:-tutti <xref:System.Device.Location>gli oggetti che dispongono di costruttori possono essere creati, ma <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>avrà sempre il valore <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> delle proprietà</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Il percorso indicato dalla <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>sarà sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Non vengono generati eventi nessuna posizione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>, given an accuracy level.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>, specificato un livello di accuratezza.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Nota** nelle versioni di Windows precedente a Windows 7, vengono applicate le seguenti condizioni:-tutti <xref:System.Device.Location>gli oggetti che dispongono di costruttori possono essere creati, ma <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>avrà sempre il valore <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> delle proprietà</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Il percorso indicato dalla <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>sarà sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Non vengono generati eventi nessuna posizione.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy> that indicates the requested accuracy level of the location provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy>che indica il livello di accuratezza richiesto del provider di posizione.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationAccuracy>

trans-unit.source: An accuracy of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"></xref> can degrade performance and should be specified only when high accuracy is needed.
trans-unit.target: Un'accuratezza di <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"> </xref> può peggiorare le prestazioni e deve essere specificato solo quando è necessario elevata precisione.

trans-unit.source: The requested accuracy level for the location data that is provided by the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il livello di accuratezza richiesto per i dati sulla località fornita dal <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An accuracy of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy> can degrade performance and should be specified only when high accuracy is needed.
trans-unit.target: Un'accuratezza di <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>può peggiorare le prestazioni e deve essere specificato solo quando è necessario elevata precisione.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy>

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Nota** nelle versioni di Windows precedente a Windows 7, vengono applicate le seguenti condizioni:-tutti <xref:System.Device.Location>gli oggetti che dispongono di costruttori possono essere creati, ma <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>avrà sempre il valore <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> delle proprietà</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Il percorso indicato dalla <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>sarà sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Non vengono generati eventi nessuna posizione.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"></xref>, which indicates the requested accuracy level of the location provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionAccuracy"></xref>, che indica il livello di accuratezza richiesto del provider di posizione.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dall'istanza corrente del <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>quando si è finito utilizzando il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>classe? qualifyHint = False / autoUpgrade = True.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should be called so that unmanaged resources can be freed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo deve essere chiamato in modo che sia possibile liberare le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dall'istanza corrente del <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> class?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>quando si è finito utilizzando il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>classe? qualifyHint = False / autoUpgrade = True.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method should be called so that unmanaged resources can be freed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo deve essere chiamato in modo che sia possibile liberare le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Consente di liberare risorse ed esegue altre operazioni di pulizia prima che il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> venga recuperata tramite garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: The distance that must be moved, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> event, before the location provider raises another <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: La distanza che deve essere spostata in metri, relativa alla coordinata dall'ultimo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> evento, prima che il provider di posizione generi un altro <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The default movement threshold is zero, which means that any change in location detected by the current location provider causes a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event and an update in the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La soglia di movimento predefinita è zero, il che significa che qualsiasi modifica nel percorso rilevato dal provider cause percorso corrente un <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>evento e un aggiornamento di <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The movement threshold does not guarantee that events will be received at the requested threshold.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > La soglia di movimento non garantisce che gli eventi verranno ricevuti alla soglia richiesta.

trans-unit.source: The platform attempts to honor requests for a particular movement threshold, but in some cases, the events will not be raised at the requested threshold.
trans-unit.target: La piattaforma tenta di accettare richieste per una particolare soglia di movimento, ma in alcuni casi, gli eventi non essere generati alla soglia richiesta.

trans-unit.source: **Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - All <xref:System.Device.Location> objects that have constructors can be created, but the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property will always have the value <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.
trans-unit.target: **Nota** nelle versioni di Windows precedente a Windows 7, vengono applicate le seguenti condizioni:-tutti <xref:System.Device.Location>gli oggetti che dispongono di costruttori possono essere creati, ma <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>avrà sempre il valore <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus> delle proprietà</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location>

trans-unit.source: - The location indicated by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will always be <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: -Il percorso indicato dalla <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>sarà sempre <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: - No location events will be raised.
trans-unit.target: -Non vengono generati eventi nessuna posizione.

trans-unit.source: The following diagram represents location coordinates that the location provider (for example, a GPS device) supplies to the computer.
trans-unit.target: Nel diagramma seguente rappresenta le coordinate di percorso che il provider di percorso (ad esempio, un dispositivo GPS) fornisce al computer.

trans-unit.source: P1, in the diagram, represents the location data included in a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> event, and P2, P3, and P4 represent points within the movement threshold.
trans-unit.target: P1, nel diagramma, rappresenta i dati sulla località incluso in un <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>evento e P2, P3 e P4 rappresentano i punti all'interno della soglia di movimento.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: So when the location provider supplies data indicating a location at those points (P1, P2, P3, and P4), no <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events are raised, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> returns P1.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, quando il provider di posizione fornisce dati che indicano un percorso di tali punti (P1, P2, P3 e P4), non <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>vengono generati eventi, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>restituisce P1.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The point P5 is outside of the MovementThreshold distance, so at that point, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.Location%2A> is updated and a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Il punto P5 è di fuori della distanza illustra MovementThreshold, pertanto a questo punto, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.Location%2A>viene aggiornato e un <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.LocationChanged>viene generato l'evento.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationProvider.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold")
trans-unit.target: ![Diagramma che illustra illustra MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "diagramma che illustra illustra MovementThreshold")

trans-unit.source: Distance, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Distanza in metri.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> object that contains the new location.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> oggetto che contiene il nuovo percorso.

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando un <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.StatusChanged"> </xref> si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatusChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the new status.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> oggetto che contiene il nuovo stato.

trans-unit.source: Called when a property of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Chiamata eseguita quando una proprietà del <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> event to implement data binding in Windows Forms applications.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>evento per implementare il data binding nelle applicazioni Windows Forms.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates that the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property, or the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo indica che il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>proprietà, il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>, proprietà o <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A>proprietà è stata modificata.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Permission%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della proprietà che è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether permission to access location data from location providers has been granted or denied.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'autorizzazione per accedere ai dati di posizione dal provider di posizione è stato concesso o negato.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether permission has been granted or denied.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica se l'autorizzazione è stato concessa o negata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> which indicates the current location.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> che indica la posizione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> which indicates the current location.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> che indica la posizione corrente.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the latitude or longitude of the location data has changed.
trans-unit.target: Indica che la latitudine o longitudine dei dati del percorso è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: This event is only raised when the distance moved since the last event exceeds the threshold that is specified by <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato solo quando la distanza spostati dopo l'ultimo evento supera la soglia specificata dal <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.MovementThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601> object passed to the event handler includes the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601> object that contains the updated location data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601>oggetto passato al gestore dell'evento include il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601>oggetto che contiene i dati di posizione aggiornata.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPositionChangedEventArgs%601>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Avviare l'acquisizione dei dati dal provider di posizione corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method enables <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> events and allows access to the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> gli eventi e consente l'accesso per il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>proprietà.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare questo metodo verrà avviata l'acquisizione dei dati dal provider di posizione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider is selected based on factors such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by the application or applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider.
trans-unit.target: Provider di posizione corrente viene selezionato in base a fattori quali l'età e l'accuratezza dei dati da tutti i provider, l'accuratezza richiesta dall'applicazione o le applicazioni e il consumo di energia e impatto sulle prestazioni associati al provider di percorso.

trans-unit.source: The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Il provider del percorso corrente potrebbe cambiare nel tempo, ad esempio, quando un dispositivo GPS perde il segnale satellite interni e un provider di eseguire la triangolazione Wi-Fi diventa il provider più preciso del computer.

trans-unit.source: If the current prioritized location provider does not have data when the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> method is called, it will start to acquire data.
trans-unit.target: Se la priorità corrente provider di posizione non dispone di dati quando il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>metodo viene chiamato, inizierà ad acquisire i dati.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the permissions have been granted to the client when the data becomes available, data can be accessed synchronously, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled.
trans-unit.target: Se le autorizzazioni sono state concesse al client quando i dati diventano disponibili, è possibile accedere in modo sincrono, dati e verranno recapitati in modo asincrono se vengono gestiti gli eventi.

trans-unit.source: If the Windows 7 Sensor and Location platform is disabled when <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> is called, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> will immediately return, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events will not be raised, and the location returned by the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> property of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> will contain <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Se la piattaforma Windows 7 sensore e il percorso è disabilitata quando <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>viene chiamato, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>restituirà immediatamente, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>non vengono generati gli eventi, e il percorso restituito dalla <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>conterrà <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoPosition%601.Location%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the current prioritized location provider does have data, it will be available synchronously immediately, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled.
trans-unit.target: Se il provider di percorso con priorità corrente dispone di dati, sarà disponibile immediatamente in modo sincrono e verranno recapitato in modo asincrono se vengono gestiti gli eventi.

trans-unit.source: If the calling application does not have permissions to access data from a location provider, the user will be prompted with a dialog box to either grant or deny permission.
trans-unit.target: Se l'applicazione chiamante non dispone delle autorizzazioni per accedere ai dati da un provider di posizione, l'utente verrà richiesto la finestra di dialogo per concedere o negare l'autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: The dialog box will be modeless.
trans-unit.target: Nella finestra di dialogo sarà non modale.

trans-unit.source: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Avviare l'acquisizione dei dati dal provider di posizione corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method enables <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"></xref> events and allows access to the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged"> </xref> gli eventi e consente l'accesso per il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>proprietà.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress the permission dialog box; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to optionally show the permission dialog box if permissions have not already been granted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per eliminare la finestra di dialogo di autorizzazione; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per essere visualizzato facoltativamente nella finestra di dialogo autorizzazioni se le autorizzazioni non sono già state concesse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current status of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato corrente di <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus"></xref> which indicates the availability of data from the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoPositionStatus"> </xref> che indica la disponibilità dei dati dal <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the status of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> object has changed.
trans-unit.target: Indica che lo stato di <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> oggetto è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: The StatusChanged event is raised on the same thread that the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher> object was created on.
trans-unit.target: Il StatusChanged evento sullo stesso thread che il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>oggetto è stato creato.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Stops the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"></xref> from providing location data and events.
trans-unit.target: Arresta il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher"> </xref> di fornire dati sulla località e gli eventi.

trans-unit.source: After Stop is called, no further <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged> events occur, and the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> property will return <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Dopo che viene chiamato, non ulteriormente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>eventi si verificano e la <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A>proprietà restituirà <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Position%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.PositionChanged>

trans-unit.source: When Stop is called, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationStatus.Disabled>.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene chiamato, la <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationStatus.Disabled>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoLocationStatus.Disabled> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinateWatcher.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initiates the acquisition of data from the current location provider.
trans-unit.target: Avvia l'acquisizione dei dati dal provider di posizione corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method returns synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce in modo sincrono.

trans-unit.source: This method blocks execution of the calling thread during the time period specified by `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo blocca l'esecuzione del thread chiamante durante il periodo di tempo specificato da `timeout`.

trans-unit.source: Use caution when calling TryStart from the user interface thread of your application.
trans-unit.target: Prestare attenzione quando si chiama TryStart dal thread dell'interfaccia utente dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress the permission dialog box; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to display the permission dialog box.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per eliminare la finestra di dialogo di autorizzazione; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per visualizzare la finestra di dialogo autorizzazioni.

trans-unit.source: Time in milliseconds to wait for the location provider to start before timing out.
trans-unit.target: Tempo in millisecondi da attendere per il provider di posizione avviare prima del timeout.

trans-unit.source: if data acquisition is started within the time period specified by timeout; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se l'acquisizione dei dati viene avviato entro il periodo di tempo specificato da timeout ; in caso contrario, .
